fixes.name: Netted T -1
fixes.dax_expression:
VAR ConditionalSum = SUMX(
    'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)',
    IF(
        'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[R/RR] = "R",
        'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[Initial Cash USD X (excl Int/FWD)] * -1,
        IF(
            'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[R/RR] = "RR",
            'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[Initial Cash USD X (excl Int/FWD)],
            BLANK()
        )
    )
)
RETURN
ConditionalSum - SUM('migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[fixed netting (T -1) ])
fixes.solution_explanation: Rewritten the Tableau Sum(IF ...) as a DAX measure using SUMX over the table with nested IF conditions: negate the Initial Cash value when R, keep it when RR, then subtract the SUM of fixed netting. All column references use the 'table'[column] format.
fixes.type_changed_reason: This calculation uses aggregation functions (SUM), so it should be created as a measure.
